title: Flashdance
creator_credit: Adrian Lyne, Jerry Bruckheimer, Don Simpson, Paramount Pictures and PolyGram
brief_description: Flashdance is the story of Alex Owens, a fiercely determined 18 year old who is a Pittsburgh steel-mill welder by day, and a bar dancer by night. We follow her struggle to gain independence, find love, and to realise her dream for a career in modern dance. Includes music by Giorgio Moroder. Cast includes Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson and Kyle Heffner.
